Class: Text

component/Text~ Text

new Text(textopt, fontSizeopt, fontFamilyopt, widthopt, heightopt, coloropt)

Basic Text display component. It creates an invisible "bounding box" around the Text to limit and break lines using the parameters width and height.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
text String <optional>
 String containing the text to be displayed
fontSize String <optional>
 Font size in pixels
fontFamily String <optional>
 Font family name
width Number <optional>
 Width in pixels for the area containing the text.
height Number <optional>
 Height in pixels for the area containing the text.
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
Source:
  • component/Text.js, line 8

Sets properties for a speech bubble
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
radius Number <optional>
 Radius of the rounded corners, in pixels
bubbleColor String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color of the background
bubbleStrokeColor String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color of the surrounding line

createTexture()

Create the texture buffer based on canvas, and attach it to the component material and mesh for rendering.
Source:
  • component/Text.js, line 293

onLoad()

Callback function, triggered by the engine
Source:
  • component/Text.js, line 251

renderIntoBuffer()

Renders the text with properties defined into the internal buffer texture, NOT on the screen. It is rendered on screen only during the SceneManager render cycle.
Source:
  • component/Text.js, line 320

reset(textopt, fontSizeopt, fontFamilyopt, widthopt, heightopt, coloropt)

Sets various properties of the font then re-parses for proper buffering
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
text String <optional>
 Text to be displayed
fontSize Number <optional>
 Font size, in pixels
fontFamily String <optional>
 Font-Family, accepts web fonts
width Number <optional>
 Buffer width, in pixels
height Number <optional>
 Buffer height, in pixels
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
